blog.title: Ideas behind the blog stack
blog.description: I share my journey from scattered notes to a unified blog using React and Vike. Modern web tech offers speed, simplicity, and full version control over traditional solutions.

prevBlog.title: Hello World
prevBlog.description: I welcome you to my personal blog exploring technology, blockchain, and creative coding. Expect insights on modern web development, decentralized systems, and innovative digital experiences.

nextBlog.title: Moving old lectures
nextBlog.description: I migrate academic lectures from LaTeX to modern web formats. Discover solutions for handling equations, references, and static site generation in JavaScript environments.
